name: Jin Angus
text: How do you make pizzas without gloves? Is this a ethical? I've been trying to get in touch with the manager, but every day she's out of the office. I don't understand this place. How do you eat the food and handle money from people and make pizzas at the same time? I was in shock, but I couldn't say anything.

name: Dback B
text: Very unorganized, long wait, they overcooked 3 pizzas while I was there,  they threw them in all in the  trash barrel. A shame.  Pizza chef was not wearing gloves.  The cook had to help the person on the register multiple times.  One other …More

name: Jon Bartus
text: Papa Gino's is a local institution in the Boston area for a reason. I've never had a bad meal there and the Andover location is no exception. Sure it's not Pizzeria Regina but it's not anywhere near as expensive either. For a solid meal …More

name: Andrew Bates
text: The pizza here is what you would expect from a chain.  The location is easy to get to in a large shopping center.  Plenty of parking and service is relatively fast.

name: Jay Honnavalli
text: Food is inconsistent. I ordered Super veggie today. There was no Broccoli or tomatoes. There was not much cheese. I asked well done. The pizza wa soggy. And then there was banana pepper as topping which i never asked.

name: Jerry
text: Good old fashioned pizza.  Oily and thin crisp crust. The staff at this location were polite and attentive.

name: Jerrod Oltmann
text: I wouldn't so much say I hated it. My pizza just never came and the place was already closed down for the night when I called. I know they had a back up and it was an hour from closing but if you aren't going to deliver then don't take my …More

name: Mark Wilcon
text: All you can eat $4.99. Can't go wrong!

name: Victoria Torres
text: Worst delivery experience I've ever had at a Papa Ginos. Delivery guy screwed up TWICE!. Ordered 1 cheese pizza and buffalo tenders. His exuse was he just delivers what it handed to him. Any delivery driver I know checks the order for …More

name: Cisco Zap
text: Place sucks. Demanded a refund. Careless shift leader.Bad service. Ghetto workers dont mean you have to make the service ghetto. I went in for the all you can in came in at 6:37 pm I waited 45 minutes patiently to waitcon my pizzas then …More

name: David Smith
text: personally my favorite location its close by and the best service here every time

name: N T
text: Two hour delivery time, regardless of the day. Under/overcook most times. Never had these issues at any of the other papa ginos locations.

name: Ra Nam
text: Ordered half Hawaiian and half sausage from Papaginos in Andover.  There was barely pineapple on the the pizza.  The pizza was hard and dried.  Love Papaginos pizza but not from this place.  Never order from this place again!  I rather drive to Papaginos in Salem NH or Haverhill...Horrible pizza...Zero rating!!!

name: Joseph Soucy
text: Don't bother using the on-line order system, you'll still have to wait just like if you walked in and ordered at counter. The wait time & unfriendly pizza makers(manager), literally 3 steps away from counter would not say sorry for the …More

name: Mentru Nagbe
text: My only experience with Papa Gino's was the restaurant catering a lunch for the school I work at in Andover. The pizza was okay, but nothing to rave about. It was a upgrade of the commercial brands, but I had better pizza from mom and pop …More

name: Stewart Allen
text: Pretty standard Papa Gino's. Nothing special. Worth driving to Sal's in North Andover for great pizza.

name: Edwin Wilkins
text: Great service.  Always friendly and food is very good!

name: Dan K
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery from the Andover Papa Gino's Saturday 10/28/17 and it arrived on time but was luke warm and part of it was stuck to the top of the pizza box. Not impressed with the delivery, which was by some kid in a Mustang.

name: Steven whitmore
text: Love Papa Gino's, one bite, everybody knows the rules! 8.2

name: Carlene L.
text: Very friendly, great service and love the pizza!

name: Bill Elliott
text: Fast service at lunch and very reasonable.

name: CKKT LEE
text: Call for a Pickup, repeat myself 3 tines Still can't an get order process, bunch Crack head!!

name: Todd Abernathy
text: Very good pizza

name: Ghassan Williams
text: Not enough cheese nice snack

name: Joseph Shea
text: Food was cold

name: Daniel Mattera
text: Good pizza subs

name: Sergey Bebenin
text: Not very welcoming for takeout visitors

name: Troy Blair
text: Ordered wings extra crispy, they arrived soggy and cold
